mapper.select: select nid, title, listimgurl from news where isdel = '0' and status = '1' and nid = #{nid}
select nid, title, listimgurl from news where isdel = '0' and status = '1' order by indexsort,createdatetime desc limit #{getCountInt}
select 1 as valueinfo from news where nid = #{nid} and status = '1' and isdel = '0'
select nid, title, listimgurl, date_format(createdate,'%Y年%m月%d日') createdate from news where isdel = '0' and status = '1' order by createdatetime desc
select nid, title, listimgurl, date_format(createdate,'%Y年%m月%d日') createdate from news where isdel = '0' and status = '1' order by createdatetime desc limit #{getcount}
select nid, title, listimgurl, date_format(createdate,'%Y年%m月%d日') createdate from news where isdel = '0' and status ='1' and title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') order by createdatetime desc
mapper.delete: delete from ir_customer_news where cid = #{cid} and nid = #{nid}
mapper.select: select a.nid, a.title, a.listimgurl from news a,ir_customer_news b where a.nid = b.nid and b.cid = #{cid}
